inclusion.criterion: Voluntarily signed written informed consent according to the rules of Good Clinical Practice (Declaration of Helsinki) and national regulations
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Anterior urethral stricture disease (penile, bulbar, penobulbar and panurethral strictures are allowed).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Procedure was ended with leaving a transurethral catheter in place with foreseen catheter removal and early postoperative imaging after x days.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Absence of signed written informed consent (Appendix B).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has anterior urethral stricture disease and a transurethral catheter was left in place. No exclusion criteria were met.
